text: Prosper Joannes Gerardus Antonius Ego (17 July 1927 – 23 January 2015) was a Dutch activist and writer. He was the founder of the Oud-Strijders Legioen (“Former Warriors Legion”). Ego was born in The Hague. Ego died in Breda, aged 87. ==Other websites== * 'Ophangen dat zooitje', De Groene Amsterdammer (22 March 1995). * Prosper Ego, Augustus 1998, critical biography produced by the Kafka in the Internet Archive * Interview with Prosper Ego in BN/De Stem (June 2004) Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch activists Category:Writers from The Hague
title: Prosper Ego
